Desc.entry: A registered charity that runs an outreach service which aims to respond to the needs of problematic drug users in black and minority ethnic communities, their families, partners and carers, by promoting harm minimisation, good health and safer communities. Provides education and information regarding drugs and drug awareness. Also offers basic counselling, advocacy and support and referral to other specialist drug agencies. Clients are seen in the environment in which they feel comfortable. All services are free and confidential. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 4344752.

Langs.entry: Arabic, Bangladeshi, Gujurati, Punjabi, Pushto, Somali, Urdu, other languages by arrangement
